pullrequest.title: Feature system part 4.5: use gz11 deps and update gtest

content.raw:
CI needs special release-tools branches for this to work, so I'll start these jobs manually:

* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ignition_physics-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64&build=37)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_physics-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64/37/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_physics-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64/37/
* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ignition_physics-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64-mojave&build=2)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_physics-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64-mojave/2/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_physics-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64-mojave/2/
* the windows build might work?
